Text Formatting:
To bold any text the text should be enclosed in …... tags in the content it self

Style:
This provides more flexibility to stlying of the elements. Here the element style should be given in standard style formt for an HTML element
For example for a font size of 20px => the style should be font-size:20px;
For the font color => font-color:#46166b;  here the color should be hex value
For text align center => text-align:center;
suppose multiple option are to be included then => font-size:20px;font-color:#46166b; text-align:center;
